results.summary: Intelligence node storage latency is high.
results.description: The storage latency of disk partition /var/log on Intelligence node UUID is above the high threshold value of 50 milliseconds.
results.recommended_action: Transient high storage latency may happen due to spike of I/O requests. If storage latency remains high for more than 30 minutes, consider deploying NSX Intelligence appliance in a low latency disk, or not sharing the same storage device with other VMs.
